DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine outpatient physiotherapy result improve and/or rapid achievement functional outcome quality life comparison patient undergo outpatient physiotherapy total hip arthroplasty
DOC.criteria: Any patient undergoing unilateral primary total hip arthroplasty age > 60 Posttraumatic osteoarthritis Rheumatoid arthritis peripheral inflammatory disease Avascular necrosis Revision conversion THA Postseptic osteoarthritis Patients discharge rehabilitation unit form respite care skilled nursing facility , acute rehabilitation center , convalescent home , longterm care facility nursing home
